content:
Hello,
The resource Composition includes intro text regarding the various allowed statuses, under the section entitled 'Composition Status Codes'. It lists and describes 5 codes as:

  • preliminary
  • final
  • appended
  • amended
  • retracted

However, the element Composition.status is bound to the CompositionStatus valueset (as required), with these 4 allowed values:

  • preliminary
  • final
  • amended
  • entered-in-error

Is this right? Presumably though, the valueset values trump any narrative. We searched zulip and GForge for related content but found nothing. (The above links are all STU3 but this is the same in the current build.)
yes the narrative is wrong - can you make a task please
